entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
